alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meriwether and northwestern Talbot Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 709 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was or 5 miles northwest of Talbotton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Woodland and Pleasant Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
